definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.english: The Australians are in the market for a communications satellite system.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚人正想购买一套通讯卫星系统。

sentences.english: Communications satellites can transmit data around the world.
sentences.chinese: 通讯卫星可以在全世界传输数据。

sentences.english: Communication satellites permit the exchange of live television programs between nations and continents.
sentences.chinese: 通讯卫星能进行跨国或跨洲实况电视转播。

sentences.english: DTH systems with high power of live satellite or communications satellite.
sentences.chinese: DTH系统中采用大功率的直播卫星或通讯卫星。

sentences.english: Telstar , the first satellite to carry TV broadcasts was launched.
sentences.chinese: 通讯卫星，首枚电视转播卫星被发射。

sentences.english: They are closely charting the progress of the telecommunications satellite.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在密切跟踪通讯卫星的运行。

sentences.english: Communications satellites, for example, have a geostationary orbit.
sentences.chinese: 比如，通讯卫星有一个对地静止轨道。

sentences.english: The transmission of data from a communications satellite to an earth station.
sentences.chinese: 从通讯卫星到地球站的数据传输。

sentences.english: Communi cation satellites have already been used for living transmission in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我国已将通讯卫星用于实况转播。

sentences.english: Communication satellites have already been used for living transmission in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我国乙将通讯卫星用于实况转播。

sentences.english: Communications satellites, for example, have a geostationary6 orbit.
sentences.chinese: 比如，通讯卫星有一个对地静止轨道。

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
